address: Xã Bàu Trâm, Thành phố Long Khánh, Tỉnh Đồng Nai
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Reorganization in Đồng Nai**

Okay, so I'm presented with the old address "Xã Bàu Trâm, Thành phố Long Khánh, Tỉnh Đồng Nai" and need to determine the new administrative unit. My process is pretty straightforward:

First, I identified the old province and ward: Tỉnh Đồng Nai and Xã Bàu Trâm, respectively. Then, I dug into the resolutions.  I checked resolution 60-NQ/TW to see if Đồng Nai had been affected by any province-level mergers, but it remained "Tỉnh Đồng Nai" albeit with a merger with Bình Phước. So, that's simple enough.

Next, I focused on resolutions relevant to Đồng Nai, specifically looking for mentions of "Xã Bàu Trâm." Resolution 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15 popped up, which is exactly what I needed - a resolution on administrative re-arrangements in Đồng Nai.  Line 78 in that resolution was the key: it explicitly states that "Xã Bàu Trâm" is merged with other wards to form "phường Long Khánh." Bingo!

I confirmed that "phường Long Khánh" exists within Đồng Nai in the data I have. The ward code "26080" matched perfectly.  My confidence is high because the resolution directly addresses the fate of "Xã Bàu Trâm."

To be thorough, I checked other resolutions that might contain "Long Khánh" to make sure there wasn't any conflicting information.  However, all other "Long Khánh" mentions were in other provinces: Đồng Tháp, Tây Ninh, and Vĩnh Long. So, no conflicting information there. The fact that the city name "Thành phố Long Khánh" is present in the original address but is a district-level unit is irrelevant because the instructions indicated eliminating all district units. The target data is province and ward, and everything points to "Phường Long Khánh" within "Tỉnh Đồng Nai."

citation.header: 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Đồng Nai
citation.line: 78. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các phường Xuân An, Xuân Bình, Xuân Hòa, Phú Bình và xã Bàu Trâm thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Long Khánh.
